availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elliott K. Gavitt (Boyd County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Delutha Randall Gavitt. Father of Sarah Jane Gavitt, Adelia Gavitt, Isabella Gavitt, and John Z. Gavitt. Merchant in Lawrence County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 86A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 796.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994044, Lawrence County Births, p. 207.
